trans-unit.source: Provides static methods for the creation, copying, deletion, moving, and opening of a single file, and aids in the creation of <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供建立、複製、刪除、移動和開啟單一檔案的靜態方法，並協助 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> 物件的建立。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.File> class for typical operations such as copying, moving, renaming, creating, opening, deleting, and appending to a single file at a time.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.File>一般作業，例如複製、 移動、 重新命名、 建立、 開啟、 刪除和一次附加到單一檔案的類別。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.IO.File> class to get and set file attributes or <xref:System.DateTime> information related to the creation, access, and writing of a file.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.IO.File>類別來取得和設定檔案屬性或<xref:System.DateTime>存取，及建立的相關資訊寫入檔案。

trans-unit.source: If you want to perform operations on multiple files, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFiles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要在多個檔案上執行作業，請參閱<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFiles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Many of the <xref:System.IO.File> methods return other I/O types when you create or open files.
trans-unit.target: 許多<xref:System.IO.File>方法會傳回其他 I/O 類型，當您建立或開啟檔案。

trans-unit.source: You can use these other types to further manipulate a file.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這些其他型別來進一步操作檔案。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see specific <xref:System.IO.File> members such as <xref:System.IO.File.OpenText%2A>, <xref:System.IO.File.CreateText%2A>, or <xref:System.IO.File.Create%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱特定<xref:System.IO.File>這類成員<xref:System.IO.File.OpenText%2A>， <xref:System.IO.File.CreateText%2A>，或<xref:System.IO.File.Create%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Because all <xref:System.IO.File> methods are static, it might be more efficient to use a <xref:System.IO.File> method rather than a corresponding <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> instance method if you want to perform only one action.
trans-unit.target: 因為所有<xref:System.IO.File>方法是靜態的它可能使用更有效率<xref:System.IO.File>方法，而非對應<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>執行個體方法，如果您想要執行單一動作。

trans-unit.source: All <xref:System.IO.File> methods require the path to the file that you are manipulating.
trans-unit.target: 所有<xref:System.IO.File>方法需要您操作檔案的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The static methods of the <xref:System.IO.File> class perform security checks on all methods.
trans-unit.target: 靜態方法<xref:System.IO.File>類別執行的所有方法上的安全性檢查。

trans-unit.source: If you are going to reuse an object several times, consider using the corresponding instance method of <xref:System.IO.FileInfo> instead, because the security check will not always be necessary.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要重複使用的物件數次，請考慮使用對應的執行個體方法的<xref:System.IO.FileInfo>相反地，因為安全性檢查會不一定有必要。

trans-unit.source: By default, full read/write access to new files is granted to all users.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，所有使用者已授都與至新的檔案的完整讀取/寫入存取。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the enumerations that are used to customize the behavior of various <xref:System.IO.File> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述用於自訂的各種行為的列舉型別<xref:System.IO.File>方法。

trans-unit.source: Enumeration
trans-unit.target: 列舉

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Specifies read and write access to a file.
trans-unit.target: 指定讀取和寫入檔案的存取權。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the level of access permitted for a file that is already in use.
trans-unit.target: 指定允許已在使用檔案的存取層級。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the contents of an existing file are preserved or overwritten, and whether requests to create an existing file cause an exception.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否保留或覆寫現有檔案的內容和要求以建立現有的檔案是否造成例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: In members that accept a path as an input string, that path must be well-formed or an exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: 在接受的路徑做為輸入字串的成員，該路徑必須是格式正確，或例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a path is fully qualified but begins with a space, the path is not trimmed in methods of the class.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果路徑是完整的但以空格開頭，路徑不被修剪中類別的方法。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the path is malformed and an exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: 因此，路徑的格式不正確，而且會引發例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, a path or a combination of paths cannot be fully qualified twice.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，路徑的組合不被完整的兩倍。

trans-unit.source: For example, "c:\temp c:\windows" also raises an exception in most cases.
trans-unit.target: 例如，"c:\temp c:\windows 」 也會引發例外狀況在大部分情況下。

trans-unit.source: Ensure that your paths are well-formed when using methods that accept a path string.
trans-unit.target: 請確定您的路徑是語式正確的當您使用接受路徑字串的方法。

trans-unit.source: In members that accept a path, the path can refer to a file or just a directory.
trans-unit.target: 接受路徑的成員，在路徑可以參考到檔案或只是目錄。

trans-unit.source: The specified path can also refer to a relative path or a Universal Naming Convention (UNC) path for a server and share name.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑也可以參考相對路徑或通用命名慣例 (UNC) 路徑的伺服器和共用的名稱。

trans-unit.source: For example, all the following are acceptable paths:
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列所有條件都是可接受的路徑：

trans-unit.source: "c:\\\MyDir\\\MyFile.txt" in C#, or "c:\MyDir\MyFile.txt" in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: "c:\\\MyDir\\\MyFile.txt 」 以 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的"c:\MyDir\MyFile.txt"。

trans-unit.source: "c:\\\MyDir" in C#, or "c:\MyDir" in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: "c:\\\MyDir 」 以 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的"c:\MyDir"。

trans-unit.source: "MyDir\\\MySubdir" in C#, or "MyDir\MySubDir" in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 「 MyDir\\\MySubdir 」 以 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的"MyDir\MySubDir"。

trans-unit.source: "\\\\\\\MyServer\\\MyShare" in C#, or "\\\MyServer\MyShare" in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 「\\\\\\\MyServer\\\MyShare 」 在 C# 中，或 「\\\MyServer\MyShare 「 在 Visual Basic 中。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.IO.File> class to check whether a file exists, and depending on the result, either create a new file and write to it, or open the existing file and read from it.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.IO.File>類別來檢查是否存在的檔案，並根據結果，請建立新的檔案，或開啟現有的檔案和讀寫自它。

trans-unit.source: Before running the code, create a `c:\temp` folder.
trans-unit.target: 在之前執行程式碼，建立`c:\temp`資料夾。

trans-unit.source: Appends lines to a file, and then closes the file.
trans-unit.target: 在檔案中加入幾行內容，然後關閉檔案。

trans-unit.source: The file to append the lines to.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中加入幾行內容的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The file is created if it doesn't already exist.
trans-unit.target: 如果該檔案不存在，則會建立它。

trans-unit.source: The lines to append to the file.
trans-unit.target: 要加入檔案的幾行內容。

trans-unit.source: Appends lines to a file, and then closes the file.
trans-unit.target: 在檔案中加入幾行內容，然後關閉檔案。

trans-unit.source: If the specified file does not exist, this method creates a file, writes the specified lines to the file, and then closes the file.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的檔案不存在，則這個方法會建立檔案，將指定的程式行寫入檔案，然後關閉檔案。

trans-unit.source: The method creates the file if it doesn’t exist, but it doesn't create new directories.
trans-unit.target: 如果它不存在，但它不會建立新的目錄，此方法會建立檔案。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the value of the `path` parameter must contain existing directories.
trans-unit.target: 因此，值`path`參數必須包含現有的目錄。

trans-unit.source: The following example writes selected lines from a sample data file to a file, and then appends more lines.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將範例資料檔中將選取的行寫入檔案，並則會附加更多行。

trans-unit.source: The directory named `temp` on drive C must exist for the example to complete successfully.
trans-unit.target: 名為的目錄`temp`順利完成範例必須存在 C 磁碟機上。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 為零長度字串，只包含空格，或包含一或多個由 <see cref="M:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars" /> 方法所定義的無效字元。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 或 <paramref name="contents" /> 是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 使用指定編碼將指定的幾行內容加入檔案，然後關閉檔案。

trans-unit.source: If the specified file does not exist, this method creates a file, writes the specified lines to the file, and then closes the file.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的檔案不存在，則這個方法會建立檔案，將指定的程式行寫入檔案，然後關閉檔案。

trans-unit.source: The results of a [LINQ to Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73cafe73-37cf-46e7-bfa7-97c7eea7ced9) query on the lines of a file, as obtained by using the <xref:System.IO.File.ReadLines%2A> method.

trans-unit.target: 指定字串和檔案路徑，這個方法開啟指定的檔案、 字串附加至檔案的結尾，然後關閉檔案。

trans-unit.source: The file handle is guaranteed to be closed by this method, even if exceptions are raised.
trans-unit.target: 即使引發例外狀況時要使用這個方法，關閉保證的檔案控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: The method creates the file if it doesn’t exist, but it doesn't create new directories.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the value of the `path` parameter must contain existing directories.

trans-unit.target: 指定字串和檔案路徑，這個方法開啟指定的檔案、 字串附加至使用指定的編碼，檔案的結尾，然後關閉檔案。

trans-unit.source: The file handle is guaranteed to be closed by this method, even if exceptions are raised.
trans-unit.target: 即使引發例外狀況時要使用這個方法，關閉保證的檔案控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: The method creates the file if it doesn’t exist, but it doesn't create new directories.
trans-unit.target: 如果它不存在，但它不會建立新的目錄，此方法會建立檔案。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the value of the `path` parameter must contain existing directories.
trans-unit.target: 因此，值`path`參數必須包含現有的目錄。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.IO.File.AppendAllText%2A> method to add extra text to the end of a file.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.IO.File.AppendAllText%2A>方法將額外的文字新增至檔案結尾。

trans-unit.source: In this example, a file is created if it doesn't already exist, and text is added to it.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，如果它不存在，並加入文字，會建立檔案。

trans-unit.source: However, the directory named `temp` on drive C must exist for the example to complete successfully.
trans-unit.target: 不過，名為目錄`temp`順利完成範例必須存在 C 磁碟機上。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is a zero-length string, contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters as defined by <see cref="F:System.IO.Path.InvalidPathChars" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 為零長度字串，只包含空格，或包含一或多個如 <see cref="F:System.IO.Path.InvalidPathChars" /> 所定義的無效字元。

trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑、檔案名稱，或兩者都超出系統定義的長度上限。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters, and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在 Windows 架構的平台上，路徑必須少於 248 個字元，檔案名稱必須少於 260 個字元。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.IO.StreamWriter" /> that appends UTF-8 encoded text to an existing file, or to a new file if the specified file does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 建立會將 UTF-8 編碼的文字附加至現有檔案或新檔案 (如果指定的檔案不存在) 的 <see cref="T:System.IO.StreamWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: A stream writer that appends UTF-8 encoded text to the specified file or to a new file.
trans-unit.target: 資料流寫入器，會附加 UTF-8 編碼的文字至指定的檔案或新檔案。

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to the <xref:System.IO.StreamWriter.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29> constructor overload.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法相當於<xref:System.IO.StreamWriter.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29>建構函式多載。

trans-unit.source: If the file specified by `path` does not exist, it is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的檔案`path`不存在，則會建立它。

trans-unit.source: If the file does exist, write operations to the <xref:System.IO.StreamWriter> append text to the file.
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案不存在，寫入作業<xref:System.IO.StreamWriter>將文字附加至檔案。

trans-unit.source: Additional threads are permitted to read the file while it is open.
trans-unit.target: 讀取檔案開啟時，允許額外執行緒。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.source: This cannot be a directory or an existing file.
trans-unit.target: 這不可以是目錄或現有檔案。

trans-unit.source: Copies an existing file to a new file.
trans-unit.target: 複製現有的檔案到新的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Overwriting a file of the same name is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 不允許覆寫相同名稱的檔案。

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to the <xref:System.IO.File.Copy%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method overload with the `overwrite` parameter set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法相當於<xref:System.IO.File.Copy%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29>方法多載`overwrite`參數設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: The `sourceFileName` and `destFileName` parameters can specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `sourceFileName`和`destFileName`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.

trans-unit.target: 這個方法不支援萬用字元參數中。

trans-unit.source: The attributes of the original file are retained in the copied file.
trans-unit.target: 複製的檔案會保留原始的檔案的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example copies files to the C:\archives\2008 backup folder.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將檔案複製到 C:\archives\2008 備份資料夾。

trans-unit.source: It uses the two overloads of the <xref:System.IO.File.Copy%2A> method as follows:
trans-unit.target: 它會使用兩個多載<xref:System.IO.File.Copy%2A>方法，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: It first uses the <xref:System.IO.File.Copy%28System.String%2CSystem.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method overload to copy text (.txt) files.
trans-unit.target: 它會先使用<xref:System.IO.File.Copy%28System.String%2CSystem.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法多載來複製文字 (.txt) 檔案。

trans-unit.source: The code demonstrates that this overload does not allow overwriting files that were already copied.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼示範這個多載不允許覆寫已複製的檔案。

trans-unit.source: It then uses the <xref:System.IO.File.Copy%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method overload to copy pictures (.jpg files).
trans-unit.target: 然後它會使用<xref:System.IO.File.Copy%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法多載來複製的圖片 （.jpg 檔案）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileStream> object created by this method has a default <xref:System.IO.FileShare> value of <xref:System.IO.FileShare.None>; no other process or code can access the created file until the original file handle is closed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileStream>這個方法所建立的物件都有預設<xref:System.IO.FileShare>值<xref:System.IO.FileShare.None>; 沒有其他處理程序或程式碼可以存取建立的檔案直到原始的檔案控制代碼已關閉。

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to the <xref:System.IO.File.Create%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29> method overload using the default buffer size.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法相當於<xref:System.IO.File.Create%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法多載使用預設的緩衝區大小。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the specified file does not exist, it is created; if it does exist and it is not read-only, the contents are overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的檔案不存在，就會建立;如果檔案存在，而且它不是唯讀，則會覆寫內容。

trans-unit.source: By default, full read/write access to new files is granted to all users.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，所有使用者已授都與至新的檔案的完整讀取/寫入存取。

trans-unit.source: The file is opened with read/write access and must be closed before it can be opened by another application.
trans-unit.target: 檔案具有讀取/寫入存取開啟時，必須先關閉另一個應用程式可以開啟它。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a file in the specified path, writes some information to the file, and reads from the file.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例中指定的路徑建立檔案、 一些資訊寫入檔案，並從檔案讀取。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="path" /> specified a file that is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 指定了唯讀的檔案。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is a zero-length string, contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters as defined by <see cref="F:System.IO.Path.InvalidPathChars" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 為零長度字串，只包含空格，或包含一或多個如 <see cref="F:System.IO.Path.InvalidPathChars" /> 所定義的無效字元。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑、檔案名稱，或兩者都超出系統定義的長度上限。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters, and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在 Windows 架構的平台上，路徑必須少於 248 個字元，檔案名稱必須少於 260 個字元。

trans-unit.source: The specified path is invalid (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑無效 (例如，它位於未對應的磁碟機上)。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurred while creating the file.
trans-unit.target: 建立檔案時發生 I/O 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is in an invalid format.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 格式無效。

trans-unit.source: for permission to read and write to the file described by the <paramref name="path" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 用於讀取和寫入所描述之檔案的使用權限<paramref name="path" />參數。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes buffered for reads and writes to the file.
trans-unit.target: 用來緩衝檔案的讀取和寫入的位元組數。

trans-unit.source: If the file specified by `path` does not exist, it is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的檔案`path`不存在，則會建立它。

trans-unit.source: If the file does exist, its contents are overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案不存在，則會覆寫其內容。

trans-unit.source: Additional threads are permitted to read the file while it is open.
trans-unit.target: 讀取檔案開啟時，允許額外執行緒。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立檔案以進行寫入和讀取的文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters, and file names must be less than 260 characters.

trans-unit.source: A path that describes a file to decrypt.
trans-unit.target: 路徑，描述要解密的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Decrypts a file that was encrypted by the current account using the <see cref="M:System.IO.File.Encrypt(System.String)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 解密目前帳戶使用 <see cref="M:System.IO.File.Encrypt(System.String)" /> 方法加密的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.File.Decrypt%2A> method allows you to decrypt a file that was encrypted using the <xref:System.IO.File.Encrypt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.File.Decrypt%2A>方法可讓您將使用加密檔案解密<xref:System.IO.File.Encrypt%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.File.Decrypt%2A> method can decrypt only files that were encrypted using the current user account.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.File.Decrypt%2A>方法可以解密使用目前的使用者帳戶已加密的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.File.Decrypt%2A> method requires exclusive access to the file being decrypted, and will raise an exception if another process is using the file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.File.Decrypt%2A>方法需要獨佔存取檔案，進行解密，而且會引發例外狀況，如果另一個處理序正在使用檔案。

trans-unit.source: If the file is not encrypted, <xref:System.IO.File.Decrypt%2A> will return a nonzero value, which indicates success.
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案未加密，<xref:System.IO.File.Decrypt%2A>會傳回非零值，表示成功。

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.IO.File.Encrypt%2A> method and the <xref:System.IO.File.Decrypt%2A> method use the cryptographic service provider (CSP) installed on the computer and the file encryption keys of the process calling the method.
trans-unit.target: 這兩個<xref:System.IO.File.Encrypt%2A>方法和<xref:System.IO.File.Decrypt%2A>方法使用的電腦上安裝並呼叫方法的程序的檔案加密金鑰的密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP)。

trans-unit.source: The current file system must be formatted as NTFS and the current operating system must be Windows NT or later.
trans-unit.target: 目前的檔案系統必須格式化為 NTFS，且目前的作業系統必須 Windows NT 或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: A path that describes a file to encrypt.

trans-unit.source: Encrypts a file so that only the account used to encrypt the file can decrypt it.
trans-unit.target: 加密檔案，只有使用加密檔案的帳戶才能將其解密。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.File.Encrypt%2A> method allows you to encrypt a file so that only the account used to call this method can decrypt it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.File.Encrypt%2A>方法可讓您加密檔案，以便只有呼叫這個方法所使用的帳戶才能將其解密。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.File.Decrypt%2A> method to decrypt a file encrypted by the <xref:System.IO.File.Encrypt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.File.Decrypt%2A>方法來解密加密的檔案<xref:System.IO.File.Encrypt%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.File.Encrypt%2A> method requires exclusive access to the file being encrypted, and will fail if another process is using the file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.File.Encrypt%2A>方法需要獨佔存取權所加密的檔案，且如果另一個處理序正在使用檔案將會失敗。

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.IO.File.Encrypt%2A> method and the <xref:System.IO.File.Decrypt%2A> method use the cryptographic service provider (CSP) installed on the computer and the file encryption keys of the process calling the method.
trans-unit.target: 這兩個<xref:System.IO.File.Encrypt%2A>方法和<xref:System.IO.File.Decrypt%2A>方法使用的電腦上安裝並呼叫方法的程序的檔案加密金鑰的密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP)。

trans-unit.source: This method is not available on all versions of Windows.
trans-unit.target: 無法在所有版本的 Windows 上使用這個方法。

trans-unit.target: 例如，不上首頁版本提供。

trans-unit.target: 要檢查的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified file exists.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的檔案是否存在。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the caller has the required permissions and <paramref name="path" /> contains the name of an existing file; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫端擁有必要的使用權限而且 <paramref name="path" /> 含有現有檔案的名稱，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method also returns <see langword="false" /> if <paramref name="path" /> is <see langword="null" />, an invalid path, or a zero-length string.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="false" /> 是 <paramref name="path" />、無效路徑或長度為零的字串，這個方法也會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If the caller does not have sufficient permissions to read the specified file, no exception is thrown and the method returns <see langword="false" /> regardless of the existence of <paramref name="path" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫端沒有充足權限讀取指定檔案，沒有例外狀況會擲回，並且不論 <see langword="false" /> 是否存在，方法都會傳回 <paramref name="path" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.File.Exists%2A> method should not be used for path validation, this method merely checks if the file specified in `path` exists.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.File.Exists%2A>方法不應該用於路徑驗證時，這個方法只會檢查中是否指定的檔案`path`存在。

trans-unit.source: Passing an invalid path to <xref:System.IO.File.Exists%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞至無效的路徑<xref:System.IO.File.Exists%2A>傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: To check whether the path contains any invalid characters, you can call the <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A> method to retrieve the characters that are invalid for the file system.
trans-unit.target: 若要檢查路徑是否包含任何無效的字元，您可以呼叫<xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A>方法來擷取檔案系統無效字元。

trans-unit.source: You can also create a regular expression to test the whether the path is valid for your environment.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以建立規則運算式來測試是否為您的環境的有效路徑。

trans-unit.source: For examples of acceptable paths, see <xref:System.IO.File>.
trans-unit.target: 如需可接受的路徑的範例，請參閱<xref:System.IO.File>。

trans-unit.source: To check if a directory exists, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.Exists%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 若要檢查目錄是否存在，請參閱<xref:System.IO.Directory.Exists%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Be aware that another process can potentially do something with the file in between the time you call the <xref:System.IO.File.Exists%2A> method and perform another operation on the file, such as <xref:System.IO.File.Delete%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，另一個處理序可以有可能做到的次呼叫之間的檔案<xref:System.IO.File.Exists%2A>方法和執行檔案，另一項作業，例如<xref:System.IO.File.Delete%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If `path` describes a directory, this method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`path`描述目錄中，這個方法會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Trailing spaces are removed from the `path` parameter before determining if the file exists.
trans-unit.target: 尾端空白會從`path`參數，然後再判斷如果檔案存在。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.File.Exists%2A> method returns `false` if any error occurs while trying to determine if the specified file exists.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.File.Exists%2A>方法會傳回`false`如果發生任何錯誤時嘗試判斷指定的檔案是否存在。

trans-unit.source: This can occur in situations that raise exceptions such as passing a file name with invalid characters or too many characters, a failing or missing disk, or if the caller does not have permission to read the file.
trans-unit.target: 可能發生這種情況下，會引發例外狀況，例如傳遞檔名無效的字元或太多的字元，失敗或遺失的磁碟，或如果呼叫端沒有讀取檔案的權限。

trans-unit.target: 下列範例會判斷檔案是否存在。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A> method to retrieve the access control list (ACL) entries for a file.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A>方法來擷取檔案的存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目。

trans-unit.source: An ACL describes individuals and/or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file.
trans-unit.target: ACL 描述個人及/或群組，讓他們已經有或沒有，在指定的檔案上採取特定動作的權限。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Access Control List Entries](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：新增或移除存取控制清單項目](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md)。

trans-unit.source: In NTFS environments, <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadAttributes> and <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadExtendedAttributes> are granted to the user if the user has <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ListDirectory> rights on the parent folder.
trans-unit.target: 在 NTFS 環境中，<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadAttributes>和<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadExtendedAttributes>授與使用者時如果使用者具有<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ListDirectory>父資料夾的權限。

trans-unit.source: To deny <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadAttributes> and <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadExtendedAttributes>, deny <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ListDirectory> on the parent directory.
trans-unit.target: 若要拒絕<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadAttributes>和<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadExtendedAttributes>，拒絕<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ListDirectory>父目錄上。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is empty, contains only white spaces, or contains invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 是空的、只包含空格或包含無效字元。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑、檔案名稱，或兩者都超出系統定義的長度上限。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters, and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在 Windows 架構的平台上，路徑必須少於 248 個字元，檔案名稱必須少於 260 個字元。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 格式無效。

trans-unit.source: The file or directory for which to obtain creation date and time information.
trans-unit.target: 要取得其建立日期和時間資訊的檔案或目錄。

trans-unit.source: Returns the creation date and time of the specified file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定檔案或目錄的建立日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> structure set to the creation date and time for the specified file or directory.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 結構，設定為指定檔案或目錄的建立日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: This value is expressed in local time.
trans-unit.target: 這個值以本地時間表示。

trans-unit.source: This method may return an inaccurate value, because it uses native functions whose values may not be continuously updated by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可能傳回不正確的值，因為它會使用其值可能不會持續更新作業系統的原生函式。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the file described in the `path` parameter does not exist, this method returns 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D.
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案中所述`path`參數不存在，這個方法會傳回午夜 12:00，1601年西元 1

trans-unit.source: (C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), adjusted to local time.
trans-unit.target: (C.E.)國際標準時間 (UTC)，調整為本地時間。

trans-unit.source: NTFS-formatted drives may cache information about a file, such as file creation time, for a short period of time.
trans-unit.target: NTFS 格式化磁碟機可能會快取檔案，例如一段時間的檔案建立時間的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: As a result, it may be necessary to explicitly set the creation time of a file if you are overwriting or replacing an existing file.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，可能需要明確地將設定檔的建立時間，如果您要覆寫或取代現有的檔案。

trans-unit.source: NTFS-formatted drives may cache information about a file, such as file creation time, for a short period of time.
trans-unit.target: NTFS 格式化磁碟機可能會快取檔案，例如一段時間的檔案建立時間的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: As a result, it may be necessary to explicitly set the creation time of a file if you are overwriting or replacing an existing file.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，可能需要明確地將設定檔的建立時間，如果您要覆寫或取代現有的檔案。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.source: The file or directory for which to obtain access date and time information.
trans-unit.target: 要取得其存取日期和時間資訊的檔案或目錄。

trans-unit.source: Returns the date and time the specified file or directory was last accessed.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定檔案或目錄上次被存取的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> structure set to the date and time that the specified file or directory was last accessed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 結構，設定為指定檔案或目錄的上次存取日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: This value is expressed in local time.
trans-unit.target: 這個值以本地時間表示。

trans-unit.source: This method may return an inaccurate value, because it uses native functions whose values may not be continuously updated by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可能傳回不正確的值，因為它會使用其值可能不會持續更新作業系統的原生函式。

trans-unit.source: If the file described in the `path` parameter does not exist, this method returns 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D.
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案中所述`path`參數不存在，這個方法會傳回午夜 12:00，1601年西元 1

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information.

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。

trans-unit.source: Each operating system manages the last write time according to its own rules.
trans-unit.target: 每個作業系統管理上次寫入時間根據自己的規則。

trans-unit.source: To improve performance, an operating system might not set the last write time value to the exact time of the last write operation, but might set it to a close approximation instead.

trans-unit.source: Moves a specified file to a new location, providing the option to specify a new file name.
trans-unit.target: 移動指定的檔案至新的位置，提供指定新檔名的選項。

trans-unit.source: This method works across disk volumes, and it does not throw an exception if the source and destination are the same.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法適用於跨磁碟區，它不會擲回例外狀況時的來源和目的地相同。

trans-unit.source: Note that if you attempt to replace a file by moving a file of the same name into that directory, you get an <xref:System.IO.IOException>.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，是否您嘗試將相同名稱的檔案移到該目錄取代檔案，將取得<xref:System.IO.IOException>。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use the Move method to overwrite an existing file.
trans-unit.target: 您無法使用 Move 方法覆寫現有檔案。

trans-unit.source: The `sourceFileName` and `destFileName` arguments can include relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `sourceFileName`和`destFileName`引數可以包含相對或絕對路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If you try to move a file across disk volumes and that file is in use, the file is copied to the destination, but it is not deleted from the source.
trans-unit.target: 如果您嘗試在磁碟區之間移動檔案和檔案正在使用中，將檔案複製到目的地，但不是會從來源刪除。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />

trans-unit.source: The file to be opened for reading.
trans-unit.target: 要被開啟來讀取的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Opens an existing UTF-8 encoded text file for reading.
trans-unit.target: 開啟現有 UTF-8 編碼的文字檔來讀取。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.StreamReader" /> on the specified path.
trans-unit.target: 指定路徑上的 <see cref="T:System.IO.StreamReader" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to the <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.%23ctor%28System.String%29> constructor overload.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法相當於<xref:System.IO.StreamReader.%23ctor%28System.String%29>建構函式多載。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example opens a text file for reading.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會開啟文字檔案進行讀取。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is a zero-length string, contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters as defined by <see cref="F:System.IO.Path.InvalidPathChars" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 為零長度字串，只包含空格，或包含一或多個如 <see cref="F:System.IO.Path.InvalidPathChars" /> 所定義的無效字元。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑、檔案名稱，或兩者都超出系統定義的長度上限。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters, and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在 Windows 架構的平台上，路徑必須少於 248 個字元，檔案名稱必須少於 260 個字元。

trans-unit.source: The specified path is invalid, (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑無效 (例如，它位於未對應的磁碟機上)。

trans-unit.target: 找不到在 <paramref name="path" /> 中指定的檔案。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is in an invalid format.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 格式無效。

trans-unit.source: for reading from the specified file.
trans-unit.target: 用於讀取指定的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />

trans-unit.source: The file to be opened for writing.
trans-unit.target: 要被開啟來寫入的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Opens an existing file or creates a new file for writing.
trans-unit.target: 開啟現有檔案或建立新檔案，以進行寫入。

trans-unit.source: An unshared <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> object on the specified path with <see cref="F:System.IO.FileAccess.Write" /> access.
trans-unit.target: 在指定之路徑上具有 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> 存取權的非共用 <see cref="F:System.IO.FileAccess.Write" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.IO.FileMode%2CSystem.IO.FileAccess%2CSystem.IO.FileShare%29> constructor overload with file mode set to <xref:System.IO.FileMode.OpenOrCreate>, the access set to <xref:System.IO.FileAccess.Write>, and the share mode set to <xref:System.IO.FileShare.None>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法相當於<xref:System.IO.FileStream.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.IO.FileMode%2CSystem.IO.FileAccess%2CSystem.IO.FileShare%29>檔案模式設定為建構函式多載<xref:System.IO.FileMode.OpenOrCreate>，若要設定的存取權<xref:System.IO.FileAccess.Write>，和共用模式設為<xref:System.IO.FileShare.None>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.File.OpenWrite%2A> method opens a file if one already exists for the file path, or creates a new file if one does not exist.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.File.OpenWrite%2A>方法開啟的檔案，其中一個已存在的檔案路徑，或如果不存在的話，會建立新的檔案。

trans-unit.source: For an existing file, it does not append the new text to the existing text.
trans-unit.target: 現有的檔案，它不會將新的文字附加至現有的文字。

trans-unit.source: Instead, it overwrites the existing characters with the new characters.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，它會覆寫現有的字元與新的字元。

trans-unit.source: If you overwrite a longer string (such as "This is a test of the OpenWrite method") with a shorter string (such as "Second run"), the file will contain a mix of the strings ("Second runtest of the OpenWrite method").
trans-unit.target: 如果您覆寫較長的字串 （例如，"This is OpenWrite 方法的測試)"使用較短的字串 （例如 [第二個執行]），檔案會包含字串的混合 (「 第二個 runtest OpenWrite 方法的")。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter may specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數會指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, use the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前工作目錄，請使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.IO.FileStream> does not support reading.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.IO.FileStream>不支援讀取。

trans-unit.source: To open a file for both reading and writing, use <xref:System.IO.File.Open%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要開啟檔案進行讀取和寫入，使用<xref:System.IO.File.Open%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.target: 開啟文字檔，將檔案的所有行讀入字串陣列，然後關閉檔案。

trans-unit.source: The file to open for reading.
trans-unit.target: 要開啟用於讀取的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Opens a text file, reads all lines of the file, and then closes the file.
trans-unit.target: 開啟文字檔，讀取檔案的所有行，然後關閉檔案。

trans-unit.source: A string array containing all lines of the file.
trans-unit.target: 包含檔案所有行的字串陣列。

trans-unit.source: This method opens a file, reads each line of the file, then adds each line as an element of a string array.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會開啟檔案讀取的檔案，每一行，然後加入做為字串陣列的項目每一行。

trans-unit.source: It then closes the file.
trans-unit.target: 然後，它會關閉檔案。

trans-unit.source: A line is defined as a sequence of characters followed by a carriage return ('\r'), a line feed ('\n'), or a carriage return immediately followed by a line feed.
trans-unit.target: 定義為一串字元後面接著歸位字元 ('\r')、 換行字元 ('\n')，或所傳回的歸位字元後面緊跟著行換行。

trans-unit.source: The resulting string does not contain the terminating carriage return and/or line feed.
trans-unit.target: 產生的字串不包含結束的歸位字元和 （或）。

trans-unit.source: This method attempts to automatically detect the encoding of a file based on the presence of byte order marks.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會嘗試自動偵測編碼的位元組順序標記存在為基礎的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Encoding formats UTF-8 and UTF-32 (both big-endian and little-endian) can be detected.
trans-unit.target: 編碼格式 utf-8，而且可以偵測 utf-32 （由小到大和位元組由小到大）。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />

trans-unit.source: Opens a text file, reads all lines of the file into a string, and then closes the file.
trans-unit.target: 開啟文字檔，將檔案的所有行讀入字串，然後關閉檔案。

trans-unit.source: The file to open for reading.
trans-unit.target: 要開啟用於讀取的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Opens a text file, reads all lines of the file, and then closes the file.
trans-unit.target: 開啟文字檔，讀取檔案的所有行，然後關閉檔案。

trans-unit.source: A string containing all lines of the file.
trans-unit.target: 包含檔案所有行的字串。

trans-unit.source: This method opens a file, reads each line of the file, and then adds each line as an element of a string.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會開啟檔案讀取的檔案，每一行，然後將每一行加入做為字串的項目。

trans-unit.source: It then closes the file.
trans-unit.target: 然後，它會關閉檔案。

trans-unit.source: A line is defined as a sequence of characters followed by a carriage return ('\r'), a line feed ('\n'), or a carriage return immediately followed by a line feed.
trans-unit.target: 定義為一串字元後面接著歸位字元 ('\r')、 換行字元 ('\n')，或所傳回的歸位字元後面緊跟著行換行。

trans-unit.source: The resulting string does not contain the terminating carriage return and/or line feed.
trans-unit.target: 產生的字串不包含結束的歸位字元和 （或）。

trans-unit.source: This method attempts to automatically detect the encoding of a file based on the presence of byte order marks.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會嘗試自動偵測編碼的位元組順序標記存在為基礎的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Encoding formats UTF-8 and UTF-32 (both big-endian and little-endian) can be detected.
trans-unit.target: 編碼格式 utf-8，而且可以偵測 utf-32 （由小到大和位元組由小到大）。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.File.ReadAllText%28System.String%2CSystem.Text.Encoding%29> method overload when reading files that might contain imported text, because unrecognized characters may not be read correctly.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.File.ReadAllText%28System.String%2CSystem.Text.Encoding%29>方法多載時讀取檔案，其中可能包含匯入的文字，因為無法辨識的字元可能無法正確讀取。

trans-unit.source: The file handle is guaranteed to be closed by this method, even if exceptions are raised.
trans-unit.target: 即使引發例外狀況時要使用這個方法，關閉保證的檔案控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.IO.File.ReadAllText%2A> method to display the contents of a file.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.IO.File.ReadAllText%2A>方法，以顯示檔案的內容。

trans-unit.source: In this example a file is created, if it doesn't already exist, and text is added to it.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中會建立一個檔案，如果它不存在，而且加入文字。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is a zero-length string, contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters as defined by <see cref="F:System.IO.Path.InvalidPathChars" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 為零長度字串，只包含空格，或包含一或多個如 <see cref="F:System.IO.Path.InvalidPathChars" /> 所定義的無效字元。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑、檔案名稱，或兩者都超出系統定義的長度上限。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters, and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在 Windows 架構的平台上，路徑必須少於 248 個字元，檔案名稱必須少於 260 個字元。

trans-unit.source: The specified path is invalid (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑無效 (例如，它位於未對應的磁碟機上)。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurred while opening the file.
trans-unit.target: 開啟檔案時發生 I/O 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Reads the lines of a file.
trans-unit.target: 讀取檔案的所有行。

trans-unit.source: The file to read.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Reads the lines of a file.
trans-unit.target: 讀取檔案的所有行。

trans-unit.source: All the lines of the file, or the lines that are the result of a query.
trans-unit.target: 檔案的所有行，或查詢結果的各行。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.File.ReadLines%2A> and <xref:System.IO.File.ReadAllLines%2A> methods differ as follows: When you use <xref:System.IO.File.ReadLines%2A>, you can start enumerating the collection of strings before the whole collection is returned; when you use <xref:System.IO.File.ReadAllLines%2A>, you must wait for the whole array of strings be returned before you can access the array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.File.ReadLines%2A>和<xref:System.IO.File.ReadAllLines%2A>方法不同，如下所示： 當您使用<xref:System.IO.File.ReadLines%2A>，您可以啟動之前，會傳回整個集合列舉字串的集合，當您使用<xref:System.IO.File.ReadAllLines%2A>，您必須等到整個字串陣列是傳回之前可以存取陣列。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you are working with very large files, <xref:System.IO.File.ReadLines%2A> can be more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 因此，當您使用非常大型的檔案，<xref:System.IO.File.ReadLines%2A>可能會更有效率。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.IO.File.ReadLines%2A> method to do the following:
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.IO.File.ReadLines%2A>方法來執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Perform [LINQ to Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73cafe73-37cf-46e7-bfa7-97c7eea7ced9) queries on a file to obtain a filtered set of its lines.
trans-unit.target: 執行[LINQ to Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73cafe73-37cf-46e7-bfa7-97c7eea7ced9)檔案以取得一組篩選其線條上的查詢。

trans-unit.source: Write the returned collection of lines to a file with the <xref:System.IO.File.WriteAllLines%28System.String%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.String%7D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, or append them to an existing file with the <xref:System.IO.File.AppendAllLines%28System.String%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.String%7D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 寫入的檔案所傳回之集合的行<xref:System.IO.File.WriteAllLines%28System.String%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.String%7D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，或將它們附加至現有的檔案與<xref:System.IO.File.AppendAllLines%28System.String%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.String%7D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Create an immediately populated instance of a collection that takes an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> collection of strings for its constructor, such as a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> or a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Queue%601>.
trans-unit.target: 建立立即填入的集合可接受的執行個體<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>集合的字串，其建構函式，例如<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>或<xref:System.Collections.Generic.Queue%601>。

trans-unit.source: This method uses <xref:System.Text.Encoding.UTF8%2A> for the encoding value.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用<xref:System.Text.Encoding.UTF8%2A>編碼值。

trans-unit.source: The following example reads the lines of a file to find lines that contain specified strings.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會讀取檔案，以尋找行包含指定的字串的所有行。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.IO.File.ReadLines%2A> method in a LINQ query that enumerates all directories for files that have a .txt extension, reads each line of the file, and displays the line if it contains the string "Microsoft".
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.IO.File.ReadLines%2A>列舉所有副檔名為.txt 的檔案目錄的 LINQ 查詢中的方法會讀取檔案的每一行，然後顯示的行，如果它包含字串"Microsoft"。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.File.ReadLines%2A> and <xref:System.IO.File.ReadAllLines%2A> methods differ as follows: When you use <xref:System.IO.File.ReadLines%2A>, you can start enumerating the collection of strings before the whole collection is returned.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.File.ReadLines%2A>和<xref:System.IO.File.ReadAllLines%2A>方法不同，如下所示： 當您使用<xref:System.IO.File.ReadLines%2A>，您可以啟動之前，會傳回整個集合列舉字串的集合。

trans-unit.source: When you use <xref:System.IO.File.ReadAllLines%2A>, you must wait for the whole array of strings be returned before you can access the array.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.IO.File.ReadAllLines%2A>，您必須等候之前可以存取陣列傳回字串的整個陣列。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you are working with very large files, <xref:System.IO.File.ReadLines%2A> can be more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 因此，當您使用非常大型的檔案，<xref:System.IO.File.ReadLines%2A>可能會更有效率。

trans-unit.target: 寫入的檔案所傳回之集合的行<xref:System.IO.File.WriteAllLines%28System.String%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.String%7D%2CSystem.Text.Encoding%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，或將它們附加至現有的檔案與<xref:System.IO.File.AppendAllLines%28System.String%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.String%7D%2CSystem.Text.Encoding%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> exceeds the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 超過系統定義的長度上限。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在 Windows 架構的平台上，路徑必須少於 248 個字元，檔案名稱必須少於 260 個字元。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> specifies a file that is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 指定唯讀的檔案。

trans-unit.source: -or-
This operation is not supported on the current platform.
trans-unit.target: 這個作業在目前平台不受支援。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="path" /> is a directory.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 是目錄。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: Replaces the contents of a specified file with the contents of another file, deleting the original file, and creating a backup of the replaced file.
trans-unit.target: 用另一個檔案的內容取代指定檔案的內容，刪除原始檔案並建立已取代檔案的備份。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.File.Replace%2A> methods replace the contents of a specified file with the contents of another file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.File.Replace%2A>方法以另一個檔案的內容取代指定檔案的內容。

trans-unit.source: They also create a backup of the file that was replaced.
trans-unit.target: 它們也可以建立已取代檔案的備份。

trans-unit.source: The name of a file that replaces the file specified by <c>destinationFileName</c>.
trans-unit.target: 取代 <c>destinationFileName</c> 所指定之檔案的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the file being replaced.
trans-unit.target: 已取代的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the backup file.
trans-unit.target: 備份檔案的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Replaces the contents of a specified file with the contents of another file, deleting the original file, and creating a backup of the replaced file.
trans-unit.target: 用另一個檔案的內容取代指定檔案的內容，刪除原始檔案並建立已取代檔案的備份。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.File.Replace%2A> method replaces the contents of a specified file with the contents of another file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.File.Replace%2A>方法會使用另一個檔案的內容取代指定檔案的內容。

trans-unit.source: It also creates a backup of the file that was replaced.
trans-unit.target: 它也會建立已取代檔案的備份。

trans-unit.source: If the `sourceFileName` and `destinationFileName` are on different volumes, this method will raise an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sourceFileName`和`destinationFileName`會在不同的磁碟區，這個方法會引發例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the `destinationBackupFileName` is on a different volume from the source file, the backup file will be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`destinationBackupFileName`是在原始程式檔中的不同磁碟區，將執行的動作會刪除備份檔案。

trans-unit.source: Pass `null` to the `destinationBackupFileName` parameter if you do not want to create a backup of the file being replaced.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞`null`至`destinationBackupFileName`參數，如果您不想建立已取代檔案的備份。

trans-unit.source: If the `destinationBackupFileName` already exists it will be overwritten with the contents of the `destinationFileName` file.
trans-unit.target: 如果`destinationBackupFileName`已經存在將會覆寫它的內容`destinationFileName`檔案。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.IO.File.Replace%2A> method to replace a file with another file and create a backup of the replaced file.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.IO.File.Replace%2A>方法來取代檔案與另一個檔案，並建立已取代檔案的備份。

trans-unit.source: The path described by the <paramref name="destinationFileName" /> parameter was not of a legal form.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destinationFileName" /> 參數所描述的路徑格式不合法。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The path described by the <paramref name="destinationBackupFileName" /> parameter was not of a legal form.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destinationBackupFileName" /> 參數所描述的路徑格式不合法。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="destinationFileName" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destinationFileName" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An invalid drive was specified.
trans-unit.target: 指定了無效的磁碟機。

trans-unit.target: 找不到目前 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileInfo" /> 物件所描述的檔案。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The file described by the <paramref name="destinationBackupFileName" /> parameter could not be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到 <paramref name="destinationBackupFileName" /> 參數所描述的檔案。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurred while opening the file.
trans-unit.target: 開啟檔案時發生 I/O 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The <paramref name="sourceFileName" /> and <paramref name="destinationFileName" /> parameters specify the same file.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceFileName" /> 和 <paramref name="destinationFileName" /> 參數指定了相同檔案。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑、檔案名稱，或兩者都超出系統定義的長度上限。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters, and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在 Windows 架構的平台上，路徑必須少於 248 個字元，檔案名稱必須少於 260 個字元。

trans-unit.source: The operating system is Windows 98 Second Edition or earlier and the files system is not NTFS.
trans-unit.target: 作業系統是 Windows 98 Second Edition 或更早版本，而且檔案系統不是 NTFS。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceFileName" /> 或 <paramref name="destinationFileName" /> 參數指定唯讀的檔案。

trans-unit.source: -or-
This operation is not supported on the current platform.
trans-unit.target: 這個作業在目前平台不受支援。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Source or destination parameters specify a directory instead of a file.
trans-unit.target: 來源或目的地參數指定的是目錄，不是檔案。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: for permission to write to file described by the <paramref name="destinationBackupFileName" /> parameter if one is specified.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入的權限所描述檔案<paramref name="destinationBackupFileName" />如果指定的參數。

trans-unit.source: Security action: Demand.
trans-unit.target: 安全性動作： 需求。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to ignore merge errors (such as attributes and access control lists (ACLs)) from the replaced file to the replacement file; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示忽略發生在已取代檔案和取代檔案上的合併錯誤 (例如屬性和存取控制清單 (ACL))，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Replaces the contents of a specified file with the contents of another file, deleting the original file, and creating a backup of the replaced file and optionally ignores merge errors.
trans-unit.target: 用另一個檔案的內容取代指定檔案的內容，刪除原始檔案，建立已取代檔案的備份，並選擇性地忽略合併錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.File.Replace%2A> method replaces the contents of a specified file with the contents of another file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.File.Replace%2A>方法會使用另一個檔案的內容取代指定檔案的內容。

trans-unit.source: It also creates a backup of the file that was replaced.
trans-unit.target: 它也會建立已取代檔案的備份。

trans-unit.source: If the `sourceFileName` and `destinationFileName` are on different volumes, this method will raise an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sourceFileName`和`destinationFileName`會在不同的磁碟區，這個方法會引發例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the `destinationBackupFileName` is on a different volume from the source file, the backup file will be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`destinationBackupFileName`是在原始程式檔中的不同磁碟區，將執行的動作會刪除備份檔案。

trans-unit.source: Pass `null` to the `destinationBackupFileName` parameter if you do not want to create a backup of the file being replaced.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞`null`至`destinationBackupFileName`參數，如果您不想建立已取代檔案的備份。

trans-unit.source: If the `destinationBackupFileName` already exists it will be overwritten with the contents of the `destinationFileName` file.
trans-unit.target: 如果`destinationBackupFileName`已經存在將會覆寫它的內容`destinationFileName`檔案。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.IO.File.Replace%2A>方法來取代檔案與另一個檔案，並建立已取代檔案的備份。

trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑、檔案名稱，或兩者都超出系統定義的長度上限。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters, and file names must be less than 260 characters.

trans-unit.target: 安全性動作： 需求。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />

trans-unit.source: A file to add or remove access control list (ACL) entries from.
trans-unit.target: 檔案，要加入或從中移除存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity" /> object that describes an ACL entry to apply to the file described by the <c>path</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity" /> 物件，描述要套用至 <c>path</c> 參數所描述之檔案的 ACL 項目。

trans-unit.source: Applies access control list (ACL) entries described by a <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity" /> object to the specified file.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity" /> 物件描述的存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目套用至指定的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.File.SetAccessControl%2A> method applies access control list (ACL) entries to a file that represents the noninherited ACL list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.File.SetAccessControl%2A>方法適用於代表 noninherited 的 ACL 清單的檔案存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目。

trans-unit.source: The ACL specified for the `fileSecurity` parameter replaces the existing ACL for the file.
trans-unit.target: 指定 ACL`fileSecurity`參數已取代現有檔案的 ACL。

trans-unit.source: To add permissions for a new user, use the <xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A> method to obtain the existing ACL, modify it, and then use <xref:System.IO.File.SetAccessControl%2A> to apply it back to the file.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入之新使用者的權限，請使用<xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A>方法來取得現有的 ACL，修改它，然後使用<xref:System.IO.File.SetAccessControl%2A>套用回到檔案。

trans-unit.source: An ACL describes individuals and/or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file.
trans-unit.target: ACL 描述個人及/或群組，讓他們已經有或沒有，在指定的檔案上採取特定動作的權限。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Access Control List Entries](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：新增或移除存取控制清單項目](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.File.SetAccessControl%2A> method persists only <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> objects that have been modified after object creation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.File.SetAccessControl%2A>方法仍然只存在<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>物件建立後已修改的物件。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> object has not been modified, it will not be persisted to a file.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>不修改物件，不會保存至檔案。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, it is not possible to retrieve a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> object from one file and reapply the same object to another file.
trans-unit.target: 因此，不可以擷取<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>物件從一個檔案，並重新套用到另一個檔案的相同物件。

trans-unit.source: To copy ACL information from one file to another:
trans-unit.target: 若要將 ACL 資訊從一個檔案複製到另一個：

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A> method to retrieve the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> object from the source file.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A>方法來擷取<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>從原始程式檔的物件。

trans-unit.source: Create a new <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> object for the destination file.
trans-unit.target: 建立新<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>目的地檔案的物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A> method of the source <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> object to retrieve the ACL information.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A>或<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A>來源方法<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>擷取 ACL 資訊的物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A> method to copy the information retrieved in step 3 to the destination <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A>或<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A>方法可複製的資訊擷取到目的地的步驟 3 中<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>物件。

trans-unit.source: Set the destination <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> object to the destination file using the <xref:System.IO.File.SetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 設定目的地<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>物件到目的地檔案時使用<xref:System.IO.File.SetAccessControl%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: In NTFS environments, <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadAttributes> and <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadExtendedAttributes> are granted to the user if the user has <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ListDirectory> rights on the parent folder.
trans-unit.target: 在 NTFS 環境中，<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadAttributes>和<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadExtendedAttributes>授與使用者時如果使用者具有<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ListDirectory>父資料夾的權限。

trans-unit.source: To deny <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadAttributes> and <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadExtendedAttributes>, deny <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ListDirectory> on the parent directory.
trans-unit.target: 若要拒絕<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadAttributes>和<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadExtendedAttributes>，拒絕<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ListDirectory>父目錄上。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A> and <xref:System.IO.File.SetAccessControl%2A> methods to add and then remove an access control list (ACL) entry from a file.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A>和<xref:System.IO.File.SetAccessControl%2A>方法來新增，然後再移除存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目從檔案。

trans-unit.source: You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example.
trans-unit.target: 您必須提供有效的使用者或群組帳戶，才能執行這個範例。

trans-unit.target: 檔案的路徑。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values.

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified <see cref="T:System.IO.FileAttributes" /> of the file on the specified path.
trans-unit.target: 在指定路徑上設定檔案的指定 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileAttributes" />。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Certain file attributes, such as <xref:System.IO.FileAttributes.Hidden> and <xref:System.IO.FileAttributes.ReadOnly>, can be combined.
trans-unit.target: 某些檔案屬性例如<xref:System.IO.FileAttributes.Hidden>和<xref:System.IO.FileAttributes.ReadOnly>，可以結合。

trans-unit.source: Other attributes, such as <xref:System.IO.FileAttributes.Normal>, must be used alone.
trans-unit.target: 其他屬性，例如<xref:System.IO.FileAttributes.Normal>，必須單獨使用。

trans-unit.source: It is not possible to change the compression status of a <xref:System.IO.File> object using the <xref:System.IO.File.SetAttributes%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 不可能變更的壓縮狀態<xref:System.IO.File>物件使用<xref:System.IO.File.SetAttributes%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the `GetAttributes` and `SetAttributes` methods by applying the `Archive` and `Hidden` attributes to a file.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範`GetAttributes`和`SetAttributes`方法藉由套用`Archive`和`Hidden`屬性加入檔案。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is empty, contains only white spaces, contains invalid characters, or the file attribute is invalid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 是空白的、只包含泛空白字元、包含無效字元，或檔案屬性無效。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑、檔案名稱，或兩者都超出系統定義的長度上限。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters, and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在 Windows 架構的平台上，路徑必須少於 248 個字元，檔案名稱必須少於 260 個字元。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is in an invalid format.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 格式無效。

trans-unit.source: The specified path is invalid, (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑無效 (例如，它位於未對應的磁碟機上)。

trans-unit.source: The file cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到檔案。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> specified a file that is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 指定了唯讀的檔案。

trans-unit.source: -or-
This operation is not supported on the current platform.
trans-unit.target: 這個作業在目前平台不受支援。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="path" /> specified a directory.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 指定了目錄。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: for reading and writing files.
trans-unit.target: 用於讀取和寫入檔案。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />

trans-unit.source: The file for which to set the creation date and time information.
trans-unit.target: 要設定其建立日期和時間資訊的檔案。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> containing the value to set for the creation date and time of <c>path</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，包含要為 <c>path</c> 的建立日期和時間設定的值。

trans-unit.source: This value is expressed in local time.
trans-unit.target: 這個值以本地時間表示。

trans-unit.source: Sets the date and time the file was created.
trans-unit.target: 設定檔案建立的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>。

trans-unit.source: NTFS-formatted drives may cache file meta-info, such as file creation time, for a short period of time.
trans-unit.target: NTFS 格式化磁碟機可能會快取檔案中繼資訊，例如一段時間的檔案建立時間。

trans-unit.source: As a result, it may be necessary to explicitly set the creation time of a file if you are overwriting or replacing an existing file.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，可能需要明確地將設定檔的建立時間，如果您要覆寫或取代現有的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The file for which to set the date and time information.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> containing the value to set for the last write date and time of <c>path</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，包含要為 <c>path</c> 的上次寫入日期和時間設定的值。

trans-unit.source: This value is expressed in UTC time.
trans-unit.target: 這個值以 UTC 時間表示。

trans-unit.source: Sets the date and time, in coordinated universal time (UTC), that the specified file was last written to.
trans-unit.target: 設定指定檔案上次寫入的日期和時間，格式為國際標準時間 (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Given a byte array and a file path, this method opens the specified file, writes the contents of the byte array to the file, and then closes the file.

trans-unit.source: The default behavior of the <xref:System.IO.File.WriteAllLines%28System.String%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.String%7D%29> method is to write out data by using UTF-8 encoding without a byte order mark (BOM).
trans-unit.target: 預設行為<xref:System.IO.File.WriteAllLines%28System.String%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.String%7D%29>方法是使用 utf-8 編碼的位元組順序標示 (BOM) 不會寫出資料。

trans-unit.source: If it is necessary to include a UTF-8 identifier, such as a byte order mark, at the beginning of a file, use the <xref:System.IO.File.WriteAllLines%28System.String%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.String%7D%2CSystem.Text.Encoding%29> method overload with <xref:System.Text.Encoding.UTF8%2A> encoding.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要包含 utf-8 識別碼，例如位元組順序標記，在檔案開頭使用<xref:System.IO.File.WriteAllLines%28System.String%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.String%7D%2CSystem.Text.Encoding%29>方法多載<xref:System.Text.Encoding.UTF8%2A>編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: If the target file already exists, it is overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案已經存在，則會覆寫該檔案。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is a zero-length string, contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters as defined by <see cref="F:System.IO.Path.InvalidPathChars" />.

trans-unit.source: Either <paramref name="path" /> or <paramref name="contents" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 或 <paramref name="contents" /> 是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑、檔案名稱，或兩者都超出系統定義的長度上限。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters, and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在 Windows 架構的平台上，路徑必須少於 248 個字元，檔案名稱必須少於 260 個字元。

trans-unit.source: The specified path is invalid (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑無效 (例如，它位於未對應的磁碟機上)。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurred while opening the file.
trans-unit.target: 開啟檔案時發生 I/O 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> specified a file that is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 指定了唯讀的檔案。

trans-unit.source: -or-
This operation is not supported on the current platform.
trans-unit.target: 這個作業在目前平台不受支援。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="path" /> specified a directory.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 指定了目錄。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is in an invalid format.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 格式無效。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: for access to write to a file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 用於寫入檔案或目錄的存取。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />

trans-unit.source: Creates a new file, write the contents to the file, and then closes the file.
trans-unit.target: 建立新檔案，將內容寫入檔案，然後關閉檔案。

trans-unit.source: If the target file already exists, it is overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案已經存在，則會覆寫該檔案。

trans-unit.source: The file to write to.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入其中的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The string to write to the file.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入檔案的字串。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new file, writes the specified string to the file, and then closes the file.
trans-unit.target: 建立新檔案，將指定的字串寫入檔案，然後關閉檔案。

trans-unit.source: If the target file already exists, it is overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案已經存在，則會覆寫該檔案。

trans-unit.source: This method uses UTF-8 encoding without a Byte-Order Mark (BOM), so using the <xref:System.Text.Encoding.GetPreamble%2A> method will return an empty byte array.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用 utf-8 編碼方式沒有位元組順序標記 (BOM)，因此使用<xref:System.Text.Encoding.GetPreamble%2A>方法會傳回空的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: If it is necessary to include a UTF-8 identifier, such as a byte order mark, at the beginning of a file, use the <xref:System.IO.File.WriteAllText%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Text.Encoding%29> method overload with <xref:System.Text.Encoding.UTF8%2A> encoding.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要包含 utf-8 識別碼，例如位元組順序標記，在檔案開頭使用<xref:System.IO.File.WriteAllText%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Text.Encoding%29>方法多載<xref:System.Text.Encoding.UTF8%2A>編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: Given a string and a file path, this method opens the specified file, writes the string to the file, and then closes the file.
trans-unit.target: 指定字串和檔案路徑，這個方法開啟指定的檔案、 將字串寫入檔案，然後關閉檔案。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.IO.File.WriteAllText%2A> method to write text to a file.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.IO.File.WriteAllText%2A>方法將文字寫入至檔案。

trans-unit.source: In this example a file is created, if it doesn't already exist, and text is added to it.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中會建立一個檔案，如果它不存在，而且加入文字。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is a zero-length string, contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters as defined by <see cref="F:System.IO.Path.InvalidPathChars" />.

trans-unit.source: for access to write to a file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 用於寫入檔案或目錄的存取。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />

trans-unit.target: 要寫入其中的檔案。

trans-unit.target: 要寫入檔案的字串。

trans-unit.source: The encoding to apply to the string.
trans-unit.target: 要套用至字串的編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new file, writes the specified string to the file using the specified encoding, and then closes the file.
trans-unit.target: 建立新檔案，使用指定的編碼方式將指定的字串寫入檔案，然後關閉檔案。

trans-unit.source: If the target file already exists, it is overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案已經存在，則會覆寫該檔案。

trans-unit.source: Given a string and a file path, this method opens the specified file, writes the string to the file using the specified encoding, and then closes the file.
trans-unit.target: 指定字串和檔案路徑，這個方法開啟指定的檔案，將字串寫入檔案，使用指定的編碼，，然後關閉檔案。

trans-unit.source: The file handle is guaranteed to be closed by this method, even if exceptions are raised.
trans-unit.target: 即使引發例外狀況時要使用這個方法，關閉保證的檔案控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.IO.File.WriteAllText%2A> method to write text to a file.
